info.name: Salon Recolor To Blue (for 4/12 site design)
info.description: An attempt to cure Salon of its new blinding black-and-red color scheme; the only other thing I altered was to delete the gigantic pointless "SALON" that was at the top.  I'm documenting with comments as I go along so people can change the colors around to suit their own preferences (and hopefully post their versions for others to try out).
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog
v. 0.8 - embedded the one image I had linked to, added screenshots
v. 0.75 - still some images to replace, colors to tweak, etc.
